title: If God Cares So Much, Why Do I Still Hurt?: A Practical Spiritual Guide to Happiness
description: Author Kerie Boshka gives you practical step-by-step guidance on how to open up your life to amazing possibilities. She shows you how to hear God for yourself, overcome grief, start over, fight negativity, strengthen relationships, heal from sorrow, put an end to daily struggles, and live a life of blessing and abundance. In spite of the disturbing circumstances that may be plaguing your life, you will not walk away from this book without gaining courage and hope as you face the future. Join Kerie as she reveals how our most tragic experiences can bring forth within us truth, wisdom, and growth if we allow them to.
author: Kerie Boshka
